## Checklist
- [ ] I have performed a **Self-Review** of my code.
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings in the terminal.

## Quality Control (Mandatory)
- [ ] **Compilation:** Does the project build without errors in VS Code?
- [ ] **Checkstyle:** Have you fixed all style warnings (Yellow squiggles)?
- [ ] **Lombok:** Are you using `@Data`/`@Getter`/`@Setter` instead of boilerplate?
- [ ] **Unit Tests:** Have you run `mvn test`? (All tests must pass).
- [ ] **Resource Management:** Did you close all FileStreams/Database connections?
